abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Highway Project for Ivory
            Coast provides: (a) construction of a new road between
            Yabayo and Gagnoa (79 km); and (b) preparation of a feeder
            road program in cotton-growing areas. As originally
            appraised, this project was to have included construction of
            the new Abidian-Sikensi road (69 km) following the
            recommendations of the transport survey and the detailed
            engineering carried out by Socieeted Etudes Techniques Et
            Economiques (SETEC). However, during preparation of the
            present report, the Ivorian Government informed the
            association of its intention to have this road financed,
            constructed, and operated as a toll road by a private group.
